mapper.select: SELECT role.id, role.role_name FROM xupt_research_team_role_table role LEFT JOIN xupt_research_team_user_role_table userRole ON role.id = userRole.role_id WHERE userRole.user_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xupt_research_team_user_table (user_account, user_password, user_name, major, grade, classify, research_direction, sex) VALUES (#{userAccount}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{major}, #{grade}, #{classify}, #{researchDirection}, #{sex})
